title: Exclusive Interview with Manish Thakkar, Chief Operating Officer, Avanti Finance - Analytics Insight
content: Exclusive Interview with Manish Thakkar, Chief Operating Officer, Avanti Finance  Analytics Insight
description: Avanti Finance is a company that completes the entire life cycle of the credit, it has integrated the various digital initiatives that are built around the Aadhaar ecosystem like KYC, fund transfers, e-mandates, UPI, E-Sign etc.
